description:
Tired of the same old emojis? Welcome to Gemmoji – the ultimate playground for creating one-of-a-kind emojis that truly express you. Whether you're looking to spice up your chats, create the perfect reaction meme, or just have fun, Gemmoji gives you the power to be endlessly creative.

Merge & Create - Combine your favorite emojis and even your own photos to craft something entirely new. The only limit is your imagination. Create a laughing cat, a pizza with a crown, or a custom avatar of your best friend. It’s mixing and matching made magical.

Text to Emoji - Type a phrase and watch the magic happen. Instantly transform your words—“Happy Birthday,” “Epic Win,” “Mood”—into a custom, visual emoji masterpiece. It’s the fastest way to say exactly what you mean, with style.

Turn Photos into Emoji - See a face that’s just too good to forget? Snap a pic and Gemmoji will instantly turn it into a personalized emoji. Perfect for capturing real-life reactions and inside jokes.

Why You'll Love Gemmoji:
· Millions of Curated Emojis
· Your Personal Emoji Collection: Save all your creations in 'My Emoji' for easy access. 
· Share the Fun Instantly: Send your custom creations directly to iMessage, WhatsApp, Instagram, and more. 
· Endless Inspiration: Explore themed packs for every occasion and mood. 

Ready to Redefine Your Conversations?
Download Gemmoji Now and Start Creating!

Privacy Policy: https://massiveappsfzco.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://massiveappsfzco.com/terms-of-use/

"Unleash Your Inner Artist with DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft! 

Tired of generic phone backgrounds? Express your unique style and stay trendy with DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft! Your ultimate creative hub, packed with powerful tools to design stunning, personalized wallpapers. Best of all, it's FREE! 

Your phone reflects you, so we built this app for fun, easy customization. From cute aesthetics to dark vibes, cool anime to lively animals, there's something for everyone. Our mission: keep your screen fresh, trendy, and uniquely YOU! 

Dive into a World of Creativity with Our 3 Main Powerhouse Features: 

1. DIY Frame Wallpaper: Your Photos, Our Magic Frames!
Transform your photos and memories into captivating wallpapers! Our DIY Frame Wallpaper section offers a vast collection of stylish frames and templates.

- Dynamic & Static Frames: Live Frames add animations; Static Frames offer timeless elegance. Photos blend perfectly with our designs!
- Easy Photo Import: Seamlessly import any gallery image. Our tools ensure perfect fit.
- Custom Backgrounds: Experiment with colors, patterns, or textures behind your photos for the perfect mood.
stickers: Add fun, trendy stickers from our diverse library to your masterpiece!
- Collage Wallpaper Craft: 100% Freeform Creation – Your Canvas, Your Rules!
2, Unleash your imagination! Collage Wallpaper Craft gives you 100% creative freedom to design unique photo collages from scratch. No templates – just pure artistic expression. Build your vision, pixel by pixel!

- Freely Import Photos: Bring in unlimited photos! Arrange, resize, rotate, and layer them as you envision.
- Add Trendy Stickers: Access our vast, updated sticker collection. Quirky characters, aesthetic elements, memes – find the perfect sticker!
- Express with Text: Add custom text, quotes, or messages. Choose from diverse fonts, colors, and styles.
- Creative Brush Tool: Draw directly on your collage! Add unique doodles, highlights, or patterns.
- Artistic Filters: Apply stunning filters for a cohesive, professional look.
3. Curated Wallpaper Gallery: Trendy, Diverse & Always Fresh!
Beyond DIY, explore our incredible, **FREE** gallery of ready-to-use wallpapers, hand-picked and constantly updated with the hottest trends:

- Aesthetic Vibes: Dreamy pastels, minimalist designs.
- Anime Magic: Iconic characters, breathtaking scenes.
- Adorable Animals: Cute cats, majestic wildlife.
- Dark Mode Delights: Sleek, battery-friendly themes.
- Silly Smile & Fun: Whimsical characters, funny memes.
Stay trendy! We constantly update our frames, stickers, and curated wallpapers with the latest mobile culture, from TikTok aesthetics to meme crazes. And yes, it's all FREE – creativity should have no bounds or price tags!

Download DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft now and transform your phone into a canvas of endless possibilities! Create, customize, captivate – all for FREE! 

Support us!
Our company always seek to improve our apps, so any thoughts are welcome via the feedback form in app’s setting.Through our app, we empower you to make your phone as awesome as you.
Share your feedback with us at: feedback.pirates@bralyvn.com
Terms of Use: https://bralyvn.com/term-and-condition.php
Privacy Policy: https://bralyvn.com/privacy-policy.php
Thank you for choosing "DIY Wallpaper & Collage Craft" and hope you all enjoy! "

Förvandla din iPhone till ett personligt mästerverk med Wallpics – den ultimata appen för levande bakgrunder, kreativa DIY-wallpapers, animerade laddningseffekter, anpassade PFP-ikoner, matchande bakgrundsset och äkta 4K-bakgrunder. Oavsett om du vill förnya din låsskärm eller skapa ett enhetligt tema mellan hemskärm och låsskärm, har Wallpics allt du behöver för att göra din enhet helt unik.

Oändliga levande bakgrunder & 4K-kvalitet
• Utforska ett omfattande bibliotek med dynamiska live wallpapers i fantastisk 4K-kvalitet – smidiga animationer som ger liv och djup till din skärm.
• Bläddra bland kategorier som abstrakt konst, naturvyer och futuristiska stadsmiljöer – allt i ultrahög upplösning.
• Njut av smidig uppspelning och full kompatibilitet med iOS Live Photo-låsskärmsfunktionen.

DIY-bakgrundsstudio
• Släpp lös din kreativitet med Wallpics intuitiva bakgrundsredigerare. Blanda mönster, färger och texturer för att skapa din egen unika bakgrund på några minuter.
• Lägg till text, klistermärken och överlägg – eller använd våra premiummallar för ett stilrent resultat.
• Exportera i både standard- och 4K-upplösning, redo att användas eller delas.

Laddningsanimationer och dynamiska effekter
• Gör laddningen roligare: välj bland ett galleri med laddningsanimationer som lyser upp batteriikonen – så underhållande att du nästan vill ha låg batterinivå!
• Från neonpulser och gnistor till vätskor och energivågor – allt är helt anpassningsbart och optimerat för iOS.

PFP-ikoner och matchande bakgrundsset
• Anpassa dina sociala profiler med en kollektion av PFP-ikoner – stiliserade avatarer, minimalistiska logotyper och neon-symboler.
• Koordinera hela din enhets estetik med matchande wallpaper-paket – perfekt anpassade lås- och hemskärmar.
• Exportera bakgrunder och ikoner samtidigt för ett enhetligt tema över hela enheten.

Funktioner i korthet

Levande bakgrunder: Animerade bakgrunder för lås- och hemskärm

DIY-wallpapers: Skapa egna med mallar, text & klistermärken

Laddningsanimationer: Visuella effekter vid laddning

PFP-ikoner: Profilbilder i olika stilar och upplösningar

Matchande bakgrundsset: Koordinerade teman för båda skärmar

4K-kvalitet: Ultra-HD bakgrunder & exportmöjligheter

Redo att ta din iPhone till nästa nivå?
Ladda ner Wallpics idag och upptäck en värld av levande bakgrunder, DIY-design, laddningsanimationer, PFP-ikoner, matchande teman och 4K-bakgrunder – allt skräddarsytt för dig.

Förvandla ditt hem med DecAI™ - där design av ditt drömhem är lika enkelt som att ta ett foto med AI.

► AI-interiördesign & inredning
Ladda upp en bild av ditt rum, välj typ av utrymme och den stil du vill ha. Vår avancerade AI-teknik analyserar rummets dimensioner och egenskaper, och genererar sedan en fantastisk inredningsplan skräddarsydd för din smak. Från modern elegans till rustik charm - vår AI-interiördesigner visar visualiseringar av möbler, färgpaletter och dekorationer som passar din personliga stil.

► AI Trädgårdsdesign
Ladda upp ett foto av din trädgård, terrass eller takterrass, och se hur vår avancerade AI skapar personliga trädgårdsdesignar på sekunder—ingen gröna tumme behövs! Från tropiska oaser till cottage-core charm, anpassar vår teknik layout med säsongsblommor, krusande stigar och mysiga sittzoner, i enlighet med din stil och utrymmedimensioner. 

► AI-exteriördesign & renovering
Förvandla ditt hus fasader och trädgård med AI-drivna designverktyg. Få bort designbegränsningar med många nya idéer för ditt hus utseende. Ladda bara upp en bild av ditt hus, välj din föredragna stil så ger AI:n dig en personlig designplan.

► Förvandla vilken sak som helst med "Ersätt"
Obegränsad kreativitet med sömlös ersättning - Trött på dina nuvarande möbler eller dekorationer? Med "Ersätt"-funktionen kan du ta bort oönskade föremål och byta ut dem mot vad du hellre vill se, och generera en ny bild som ger nytt liv till ditt hem.

► Effektivt städande med "Rensa"
Enkelt städ för ett perfekt hem - Med bara ett klick kan du ta bort oönskade föremål från ditt rum för att omedelbart få ett städat och organiserat livsmiljö som känns mer bekvämt.

► Upptäck nya väggar
Förnya ditt rum med "Nya väggar". Byta texturer och färger enkelt, och visualisera den perfekta väggytan utan att behöva måla. Vår AI säkerställer att varje förslag matchar din vision.

► Förhandsgranska dina golvalternativ
Varför vänta på det perfekta golvet när du kan se det direkt? Vår "Installera nya golv direkt"-funktion låter dig förhandsgranska ett brett urval av golvalternativ, från trägolv till kakel, direkt på din enhet. Upplev den omedelbara effekten av nya golv på rummets design och ta välgrundade beslut om ditt nästa hemförbättringsprojekt.

► Utforska rumdesignidéer
Letar du efter inspiration? "AI-interiördesign" är din källa till många rumdesignidéer. Oavsett om du börjar från början eller bara vill uppdatera ett rum, ger vår app många idéer som passar alla stilar.

Do you want to learn how to draw but don't know where to start? Or do you simply want to create unique artwork that combines reality and virtual elements? AR Drawing - Sketchar App is the perfect tool for you! 

Rated 4.5 stars by the community, AR Drawing is the most advanced and beloved camera-based drawing tool for everyone, from beginners to seasoned artists. AR Drawing - Sketchar App, the ultimate tool for learning to ar draw, ar draw sketch and trace anything

With AR Drawing with Sketchar App, Transform Your Real World into a Creative Canvas! Unleash your inner artist and transform any surface into your personal canvas using the power of augmented reality

Join 50 million users worldwide who are discovering the power of AR drawing and sharing unique AR artworks daily. You can draw unlimited pictures and share your magnificent results with friends and family as you like, mastering the art to ar draw, ar draw sketch and trace anything.

With advanced Augmented Reality (AR) technology, you can 
1. Draw through camera
- Place your phone on a stand, look through the screen, and sketch everything you see – from sample photos and surrounding objects to entire scenes!
- Easily draw unlimited characters you love, such as Hello Kitty, Pikachu, or Jujutsu Kaisen, right through your camera.
- Explore an endless array of today's hottest topics like Anime, Cartoon, Animal, Cute, Food, Chibi, People, Fanart, Vehicle, Flowers, Eyes, Christmas, Nature, and more.

2. Learn to Draw Easily
- Transform complex photos into simple outlines for tracing, an excellent way to practice your drawing skills.
- Discover a diverse range of lessons tailored to artists of all levels. Choose from three difficulty levels, each offering progressively challenging exercises to hone your skills and unleash your creativity.

3. Unlimited Creativity with AR Drawing
- Select from a diverse sample library or import photos from your own gallery.
- Enhance your drawings with advanced options: Adjust Opacity for the best display, Record video of your drawing process easily, Zoom in-out of the image as you wish, On-off flash, and Extend.
- Notably, detailed video tutorials are available for beginners on how to draw specific pictures.

4. Share Your Masterpiece
- Effortlessly share your finished artwork with the community and your friends.
- Download videos of your unique drawing process and enjoy watching them. 

Personalize your content and drawing experience.
- With your AR Drawing profile, track your drawing skill improvement journey, including time spent drawing and lessons completed.
- Access personalized sketch content tailored for your AR drawing and 'trace anything' experience."

Download the AR Drawing - Sketchar App now and join millions of artists discovering a new way to draw.
If you have any questions or contributions to the app, do not hesitate to contact us via email: feedback.drawsketch@bralyvn.com. We value your contributions and will do our best to meet all requirements and improve product quality.

Join more than 70 million Pixelcut creators! Pixelcut’s background remover, AI background generator, and Magic Eraser helps you create amazing photos in seconds. Pixelcut is an AI photo editor that helps you edit images with ease.

HERE’S WHAT YOU GET:
Background Eraser - Instantly remove background from any photo to get a transparent background, and then change background to an AI background or color. Pixelcut’s background remover is the most precise background remover in the world. After you remove background, you can add a white background or AI generated background to make your photos look pro. Pixelcut’s background eraser works on every type of image (even hair!) and is super accurate. Our background eraser is perfect for product photos, YouTube thumbnails or any other reason you’d like to remove background of your photo.  
Magic Eraser - Remove objects with the swipe of a finger. Erase objects and cleanup pictures in seconds. No blurry mess like other apps, with Pixelcut you can remove objects from photos like they were never there!
AI Backgrounds - Generate AI backgrounds for your photo. If you want to do more than remove background, our AI background generator will help you change background of any photo to an amazing AI generated background. Put your product on a beautiful kitchen counter or change background of a selfie to the beach!
White Background - Quickly replace background with a white background or change background to any color. You can also choose from over 2 million backgrounds.
AI Shadows - After you change background to a white background or replace background with our AI background generator, you can easily add a beatiful AI shadow to give your product a professional look!
Templates - Choose from thousands of templates designed to help you sell more!

Pixelcut’s mission is to help your photos stand out whereever you post online. You now have all of the power of a photo studio on your iPhone! 

Download Pixelcut and grow your business today!

AR Drawing, sketch trace draw is your ultimate companion for trace & draw enthusiasts, offering an immersive experience in AR tracing. This app lets you turn any photo or sample into an outline that you can trace, perfecting your skills and creating stunning artworks with ease.

Features:
1. AR Drawing, draw with Camera: Immerse yourself in the world of AR drawing with real-time projections on your drawing surface. Whether it's a real sketch or a fun doodle, our app makes it simple and enjoyable.

2. Turn Photos into Real Sketches: We've added a powerful new feature that allows you to transform any photo into a trace sketch outline. This is perfect for those who want to create detailed, real sketches with precision.

3. Sketch Templates: Explore a wide array of sketch templates from animals to vehicles, Manga to Anime, and more. These templates are perfect for practicing and perfecting your trace drawing technique.

4. Instantly Find and Trace Anything: Import photo from your camrera or gallery or browser. Once you find something inspiring, you can instantly convert it into a traceable sketch and start drawing right away.

6. Capture the Process with Video Recording: Document your creative journey by recording your AR Draw Sketch sessions. This feature allows you to revisit your process or share it with others, providing a unique way to showcase your artistic evolution.

7. Save and Share: Once you've finished your trace to sketch creation, save it to your gallery or share it on social media. Show off your sketch trace to family and friends with just a few taps.

AR Drawing, sketch trace draw is more than just an app; it's your gateway to mastering the art of tracing and sketching. With our newly added features—Turn Photos into Real Sketches and Instantly Find and Trace Anything—your creative possibilities are endless. Whether you're creating a detailed real sketch or a simple outline, our app provides the tools you need to bring your drawings to life with AR tracing.

Download AR Drawing, sketch trace draw today and start your creative journey!

- Experience the best in AR tracing with our cutting-edge technology.
- Transform photos into artistic masterpieces with trace to sketch functionality.
- Create beautiful trace drawings effortlessly using AR draw sketch.
- Perfect your skills with a wide range of sketch templates.
With AR Drawing, sketch trace draw, your creativity knows no bounds. Sketch trace with ease, and explore the world of AR drawing with this powerful app.

Download now and unleash your creativity like never before!

• Privacy policy: https://sites.google.com/view/art-racer-trace-drawing/home
• Term of use(EULA): https://sites.google.com/view/eula-ar-tracer/home

Download AR Tracer: Trace Drawing now and unleash your creativity!

Home AI ger dig expertisen hos en inrednings- och trädgårdsdesigner – direkt i fickan! Redesigna enkelt ditt hem, din trädgård och utsida i en mängd imponerande stilar med hjälp av avancerad AI-teknologi.
Ta eller ladda upp ett foto av det rum, den trädgård eller det utrymme du vill designa om, välj en stil – eller ladda upp en inspirationsbild – och få genast designförslag med oöverträffad detaljrikedom och precision.


Vill du modernisera vardagsrummet, fräscha upp väggfärgen i sovrummet, totalrenovera köket eller förvandla trädgården till en avslappnande oas? Home AI har allt du behöver.
Oavsett om du är en husägare som vill ha en ny look eller en mäklare som ska styla en bostad till perfektion är Home AI din ideala designpartner.
Appen fungerar som din personliga AI-assistent för inredning och trädgårdsdesign och ger dig skräddarsydda lösningar i realtid – helt anpassade efter just ditt utrymme.

【Smidig design av hem & trädgård – direkt i din mobil】
Snabb makeover av rum & trädgård: Ta en bild av vilket inomhus- eller utomhusutrymme som helst, och Home AIs avancerade AI-teknik skapar direkt fantastiska designförslag anpassade till din layout. Se magin hända – där varje väggfärg, dekoration och utomhusdetalj är noggrant genomtänkt.


Designa med hjälp av referensbilder: Vill du att ditt sovrum ska se ut som din favorit-Pinteresttavla? Ladda upp en inspirationsbild så matchar Home AI stilen – och återskapar din vision i ditt faktiska utrymme.


Stilbibliotek för inomhus & utomhus: Släpp loss din inre designer med vårt omfattande bibliotek med 10+ inrednings- och trädgårdsstilar. Från modern minimalism till rustik uteplats-charm – Home AI hjälper dig att mixa, matcha och hitta den stil som passar just dig.


Byt ut vad som helst, designa om allt: Vill du bara byta väggfärg, ersätta soffan eller uppdatera utemöblerna? Med Home AI kan du välja specifika element och direkt se hur det påverkar helheten.
Smarta tips som går längre än bara stil: Home AI ger värdefulla rekommendationer kring möbler, dekoration, trädgårdsupplägg och färgpaletter som kompletterar din valda stil perfekt. Skapa ett harmoniskt och sammanhängande intryck – inomhus och utomhus.

【Mer än bara visualisering】
Spara & dela dina idéer: Spara dina favoritdesigner för framtida inspiration. Dela med vänner, familj eller proffs för feedback och samarbete.
Hämta inspiration – både inne & ute: Utforska oändliga inrednings- och trädgårdsidéer för att väcka din kreativitet. Home AI hjälper dig hitta rätt balans mellan funktion och skönhet i hela hemmet.

【Home AI är det perfekta verktyget för dig som vill:】
Visualisera hem- & trädgårdsidéer med lätthet
Utforska stilar eller ladda upp egna referensbilder
Testa nya färger eller byt ut möbler & dekoration
Förnya ett rum eller göra en fullständig makeover
Samarbeta med vänner, familj & designers
Låta kreativiteten flöda & skapa ditt drömhem

Ladda ner Home AI idag och lås upp en värld av designmöjligheter – både inomhus och utomhus!

Turn words into videos instantly.
OpenVideo lets you create high-quality, visually stunning videos from simple text using advanced AI.
No editing skills? No problem. Just describe your idea, and OpenVideo does the rest.

AI Studio - AI Video Generator
Create AI Videos, Clips & Reels from Text or Images

Turn ideas into cinematic video content in seconds. No editing skills required.

AI Studio transforms a short prompt or reference images into a fully animated movie-style shot, perfect for UGC ads, promos, trailers, reels/shorts, tutorials, and social storytelling.

Powered by industry models
Built on Veo 3 & Veo 3.1 (Google DeepMind) and Sora 2 (OpenAI) via official APIs. Not affiliated, sponsored, or endorsed by Google or OpenAI.

What you can make
Text-to-Video: Describe a scene → get an animated clip.
Image-to-Video: Upload a still → generate realistic footage.
Reference-to-Video: Keep the same face/product/outfit/background across scenes with multi-image references.
Ad Factory: Brief → shot list → ready-to-publish UGC ad.
Fine Controls: Lock colors, camera, composition; exclude elements.
Aspect Ratios: 9:16 (vertical), 16:9 (landscape).
Quality & Formats: Up to 1080p exports, no watermark.
Brand-safe Exports: Designed for TikTok, Reels, Shorts, YouTube.

Great for: social posts, promo clips, product demos, ad creatives, logo stingers, explainers, movie-style trailers, experimental AI video art.

How it works
Pick a model (e.g., Veo Fast/Pro, Sora Fast/Pro).
Enter a prompt and optionally add reference images.
Preview settings (length, aspect, audio) and see required credits before you generate.
Render your movie-style clip and export.
Typical length per generation: 4–12 seconds (model-dependent).
Create longer pieces by stitching multiple shots/clips.

Credits, Costs & Plans
Credits required per generation depend on model, duration, and quality.
The credit cost is shown upfront before you hit generate.
Choose pay-as-you-go credit packs or auto-renewing subscriptions.
One-time credit packs: e.g., 60 / 150 / 450 / 1000 /2150 credits.
Weekly subscriptions: e.g., 60 / 100 / 150 / 250 / 350 / 450 / 750 credits.
Monthly subscriptions: e.g., 150 / 250 / 350 / 450 / 600 / 900 / 1000 / 2150 credits.
 
Auto-renewal: Subscriptions renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the period ends. Your iTunes account is charged at purchase and within 24 hours of renewal.

Rollover: Unused credits continue to roll over while your subscription stays active.
Refunds: Handled by Apple under Apple’s policies.

Legal & Disclaimers
Model access: The app connects to third-party generative models (including Veo 3/Veo 3.1 and Sora 2) via our servers. This is not an official Google or OpenAI product.

Affiliation: Not owned by, endorsed by, or affiliated with Google, Google DeepMind, OpenAI, or their affiliates. We participate in Google for Startups.

Support

Mico — Your Home Screen Personalization App, fully optimized for OS 26！

Fully adapted for OS 26 — unlock customizable Animated Artwork, explore a wide range of popular 3D & Depth Effect Wallpapers, and enjoy the upgraded Liquid Glass Theme that brings a unique texture to your home screen.

【OS 26 Depth Effect Wallpaper & Liquid Glass Theme】

* Depth Effect Wallpaper：Specially optimized for OS 26, the all-new Depth Effect Wallpapers use intelligent layering and spatial design to seamlessly blend time and wallpaper elements, bringing a vivid sense of depth and personality to your screen.

* Liquid Glass Theme：Explore the artistic fusion of light and fluid textures, unlocking a fresh and unique visual experience.

【DIY Live Wallpapers & Battery Icon Wallpaper】
Supports static/dynamic wallpaper creation, with a wide range of templates like Polaroid, heart collage, flip cards, labubu live wallpaper, and more. There are also various battery icon stickers and battery widget to personalize the top status bar of your phone, making your wallpapers even more fun. Your home screen becomes a unique design that's truly your own.

【Theme Template, One-Click To Use】 
Mico's theme pack lets you mix and match stylish widgets and lock screen templates to create a home screen that's uniquely yours. Top widgets and stunning wallpapers created by designers from around the world—yours to use with just a tap. Effortlessly design your perfect home screen.

【Home & Lock Screen Widgets】 
Transform your iOS experience with customizable widgets for both Home Screen and Lock Screen!  
*Couple widget: Couple widgets let you and your partner share a little love right on your home screens. No matter how far apart you are, you’ll always feel connected.
*Battery widget: The Battery Widget not only shows your power level but also matches your home screen aesthetic with customizable styles and themes.
*Photo widget: provide a variety of styles of photo frames, cute pets, retro game consoles, movie film styles, everything 
*Animation widgets: emoticon packs, flashing emoticons, GIF, bear emoticon animations, cute cat animations, flashing hearts... 

【New iOS 18 Widgets & Themes】
Fully compatible with iOS 18 – supports customizing the control center and lock screen buttons, with plenty of cute, text, and animated icons. 

【Support Apple Health Tracking】 
Mico Lock Screen Widget integrates Apple Health App to display health data such as steps in widgets. If you want to use a super widget that contains health data, please allow the APP to access health data when entering the widget preview page.
